job_title: Senior Program Coordinator in Mildenhall, England
pros: - Tuition remissions   - Health benefits  - Get to work with customers and make a difference    -Very divers job functions: marketing, budgeting, customer service, working on computers, public speaking
cons: - Was difficult to advance if you did not work in headquarters      -Pay was low

review_title: Severely disappointed with its 18 month retainment policy - easily dismissed after 7 years
pros: Flexibility and location of campus and online curriculum
cons: Complete and total disregard for workforce and lack of loyalty after years of service

pros: Great benefits and management - enjoyed my work there
cons: None that I can think of
